title: Kenneth Cole Reaction Home Urban Bloom Bedding Collection at Bed Bath & Beyond
transcripts: The urban bloom comforter and betting collection by Kenneth Cole reaction home was designed exclusively for bed bath and beyond. The first layer of the bed begins with the hero shams. They add an ideal backdrop to the bed. And are 100 percent cotton. In a cobblestone quilting pattern. The matching layered coverlet provides a layer of luxury and artistry. The urban blue comforter and pillow shams are edge of card digital floral pattern in platinum and ivory. The coordinating pillow sounds are finished with the same digital floral effect. The reverse of the comforter is a mini Chevron pattern. The resulting bed is cool and urban. The decorative pillows accenting this bed suite are a rectangular Chevron pattern pillow in a light platinum with sequins and matte satin. A square splatter printed matte satin with an ivory gold and dusty purple face and an embroidered Velvet pillow with a tonal all bright color blocking pattern. The pillows at the key fashion elements to complete this bed look. The urban bloom comforter and bedding collection is part of the Kenneth Cole reaction home collection. It is available exclusively online and at select bed bath and beyond stores.
